description: This file provides utility functions for the Slap Object Record (Obj Record) object within the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP). It primarily contains a single function 'SlapCreateObjRecord' which creates a new Obj Record object. The file includes licensing, copyright, and author information, as well as a description of its environment and purpose.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapCreateObjRecord(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates a new Slap Obj Record object using the provided container, owner, and reserved handles.
